info.name: Fantasy App - Playing XI Sequential System (Updated)
info.description: Complete test collection for sequential Playing XI system. RECENT UPDATES: League ID fix, DELETE removed, deadline timer fix, sequential blocking UI. Last updated: Oct 2025

request.description: Verify league has transfer_limit set (should be 10 by default)
Verify team has captain_free_change_used and vice_captain_free_change_used fields (should be false initially)
Get initial transfer stats - should show 0 used, 10 remaining, both free changes available
Should return empty lineup, no previous match, canEdit: true

item.name: Save Playing XI for Match 842 (First Match)

body.raw:
{
  "teamId": {{team_id}},
  "matchId": {{match_842}},
  "leagueId": {{league_id}},
  "squad": [
    {"playerId": "1463374", "playerName": "Virat Kohli", "playerRole": "Batsman", "squadName": "IND"},
    {"playerId": "253802", "playerName": "Rohit Sharma", "playerRole": "Batsman", "squadName": "IND"},

    {"playerId": "481979", "playerName": "Mohammad Shami", "playerRole": "Bowler", "squadName": "IND"},
    {"playerId": "793463", "playerName": "Kuldeep Yadav", "playerRole": "Bowler", "squadName": "IND"},

  ],
  "captain": "1463374",
  "viceCaptain": "253802"
}

request.description: Save first Playing XI. Should succeed with 0 transfers used.
Verify lineup is saved correctly with captain and VC
Should return auto-prefilled lineup from Match 842. Check autoPrefilled flag.

item.name: Get Playing XI for Match 846 (Auto-prefilled from 844)

request.description: Should auto-prefill from Match 844, NOT Match 842

item.name: Get Transfer Stats After Free Captain Change

request.description: Should show: transfersUsed: 2, captainFreeChangeUsed: true, captainChangesRemaining: 0

item.name: Get Playing XI for Match 848 (Auto-prefilled from 846)

request.description: Should auto-prefill from Match 846

item.name: Save Match 848 - Captain Change Costs 1 Transfer

request.description: Changed captain from 253802→625371 (free change already used). Should cost 1 transfer. Total: 3 transfers, 7 remaining.

item.name: Get Transfer Stats After Paid Captain Change

request.description: Should show: transfersUsed: 3, transfersRemaining: 7

item.name: Try to Save Match 846 Before Match 844 (Should Fail)

request.description: Should return error: 'Please save Playing XI for Match 844 first' (if 844 not saved)

item.name: Try to Edit Locked Match (Should Fail)

request.description: If Match 842 deadline has passed, should return error: 'Cannot save - deadline has passed'

item.name: Try to Exceed Transfer Limit (Should Fail)

request.description: Changing all 11 players should exceed limit. Should return error with remaining transfers.
Should return error: 'Captain and Vice-Captain required'

item.name: Save With Same Captain and VC (Should Fail)

request.description: Should return error: 'Captain and Vice-Captain must be different'

item.name: Delete Playing XI for Unlocked Match

request.description: Should succeed if match hasn't started

item.name: Try to Delete Locked Match (Should Fail)

request.description: Should return error: 'Cannot delete - match has already started'
